sections.name: overview
sections.prompt: Provide an engaging 2-3 sentence overview highlighting what makes this collectible special and desirable.

sections.name: historical_background
sections.prompt: Describe the era, maker, and cultural context of this piece. Include any relevant history about the manufacturer or style.

sections.name: physical_description
sections.prompt: Detail the materials, construction, dimensions, colors, patterns, and any distinguishing features or maker's marks.

sections.name: condition_assessment
sections.prompt: Honestly assess the condition, noting any chips, cracks, repairs, fading, or wear patterns.

sections.name: provenance
sections.prompt: Include any known history, previous ownership, or documentation that accompanies the piece.

sections.name: collector_appeal
sections.prompt: Explain why this piece appeals to collectors, including rarity, market trends, and display potential.

description_structure.tone: warm and informative, historically grounded, enthusiastic but honest

condition_criteria.Mint: Perfect condition, no flaws, appears unused or as-new
condition_criteria.Near Mint: Virtually perfect with only the slightest signs of age
condition_criteria.Excellent: Minor wear, small imperfections, displays beautifully
condition_criteria.Very Good: Light wear, may have small chips or light scratches
condition_criteria.Good: Obvious wear, possible repairs, still attractive and complete
condition_criteria.Fair: Significant wear or damage, sold as-is

title.example: Roseville Pottery Futura Vase Art Deco 1928 - Excellent

authentication_prompts: Examine maker's marks, stamps, or labels under magnification
Compare construction methods to period-correct examples
Look for signs of artificial aging or modern reproduction
Check for consistent wear patterns appropriate to age
Research the maker's production history and known variations
Consider professional appraisal for valuable pieces
common_red_flags: Marks that appear too crisp or modern
Materials not available in the stated period
Poor quality compared to known authentic examples
Suspiciously low price for purported rarity
Missing provenance for claimed historical significance
